about_the_game:
Welcome to Yusei Academy!

The start of your college life begins today! But it's not school studies you have on your mind...no, no, no— what you have in mind is something much more grandiose— Love! Throughout summer break you put all your efforts into devising a fool-proof two-step plan in order to achieve the college romance you've been dreaming of your entire life. "What is this fool-proof two-step plan?" — you might be asking yourself. Well that would be...

—OPERATION: Annex Husbando—

"STEP 1! Find the boy of your dreams..."

"STEP 2! Make him yours."

With this plan, there's no way you can fail! But love wouldn't be love without emotions. Overcome your emotions and fight for the boy of your dreams across FIVE action-packed Bullet Hell sequences and put your love to the test!

This challenge isn't for the faint-hearted nor for those trying to breeze through life—this is love we're talking about here! Whether it be overcoming your own complicated feelings of love, or defeating your rival in a lovers quarrel showdown...the romance you always dreamed of having won't be obtained without a fight!

Love isn't all sunshine and rainbows...sometimes love can be hell.

Game Content

-Half Visual Novel, Half Bullet Hell: Love Hell, is a standard Visual Novel with Bullet Hell sequences intertwined with the story.

-Enter the Battle Arena!: The Bullet Hell sequences are replayable once unlocked through the story via the main menu. Try new loadouts, and shoot for new high scores in the Battle Arena!

-Post-Game Content!: Once you complete the story, you will unlock the "Extra Dates!" game mode. This will give you new story content, introducing new character interactions between the cast to see what they're up to after the story ends!

-Gallery and Dev Log!: Check out a collection of art from the game in the gallery, or learn more about the development of the game via the Dev Log!

-Character Bios!: Learn more about each of the characters. What they like, don't like, and even things you probably don't even care to learn about!

-Post-Release Content!: I plan on updating the game periodically with new "Extra Dates!" content. Check back regularly to see what the crew is up to!

Meet the Cast

short_description: Love Hell is a cross between a Visual Novel and a Bullet Hell, where you have to battle your emotions in order to get with the boy of your dreams! Participate in school activities, defeat your rival, and even play...rock, paper, scissors? Embark on an action-packed journey for romance!
